edu.umaryland.igs.idea
Class AffixLengthLimiter

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.InputVerifier
      edu.umaryland.igs.idea.TextFieldInputVerifier
          edu.umaryland.igs.idea.StateDependentInputVerifier
              edu.umaryland.igs.idea.AffixLengthLimiter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public class AffixLengthLimiter
extends StateDependentInputVerifier
implements Cloneable

AffixLengthLimiter is an extension of StateDependentInputVerifier for text fields which are converted to filename affixes (prefixes, suffixes or infixes), such as omega. These affixes may affect the compliance of filename parameters with length limits.

Written:

Copyright (C) 2007, Amy Egan and Joana C. Silva.

All rights reserved.

Author:
Amy Egan

Constructor Detail

AffixLengthLimiter

public AffixLengthLimiter(String parameterName,
                          String affixParameterName,
                          IDEAConfiguration config)
This constructs a AffixLengthLimiter from the name of a filename parameter, the name of a parameter to be used as an affix for that parameter and the IDEA configuration reflecting the state of all parameters at the time of this AffixLengthLimiter's creation. Changes to parameters after this AffixLengthLimiter's creation will be reflected in this class's currentState member.

Parameters:
parameterName - the name of a parameter to which another parameter will be affixed
affixParameterName - the name of a parameter to validate as an affix to another (typically filename) parameter
config - the state of all parameters
Method Detail

clone

public Object clone()
Deprecated. 

Overrides:
clone in class StateDependentInputVerifier

verifyText

public boolean verifyText(String text)
The verifyText method for AffixLengthLimiter performs the validation required by the filename parameter based on a tentative update of the affix parameter to the value the user has entered. If the user's entry is found to be invalid, the previous value for the affix parameter is restored.

Specified by:
verifyText in class TextFieldInputVerifier
Parameters:
text - the user's entry for the affix parameter
Returns:
whether the filename parameter is valid if the affix parameter is updated to the value the user has entered

errorMessage

String errorMessage(String text)
The errorMessage method for AffixLengthLimiter augments the error message returned by the filename parameter's validator with a message explaining the interaction between the two parameters.

Specified by:
errorMessage in class TextFieldInputVerifier
Parameters:
text - the user's entry for the affix parameter
Returns:
the error message to be given when the user's entry is invalid
